root.name: Intrigue At Oakhaven Plantation
root.description: OverviewThe game is played from a 1st-person perspective and consists of 20 puzzles. The game features two-swappable playable characters: Daphne and Dominic. The game was developed and published by Cindy Pondillo. System RequirementsPentium 500 MHz.32 MB RAM.Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP.DirectX 5 or higher.Compatible with all DirectX-compatible sound and video cards.
